Our Advantages

Sharing experience

Our employees are always ready to share their experience, as they themselves run half marathons, crossed the Bosphorus, prepare for triathlon competitions!

We care about health

We work to ensure that your sports activities are beneficial to your health and be a joy to you and your loved ones!

Learn to run

We help with learning the correct running technique! We are friends with the largest running school in USA - I LOVE RUNNING.

Martin Rodriguez

1 half marathons

Cool thing - a heart rate monitor. I usually run without them. Turns out I was only making things worse for myself.

I bought a heart rate monitor, I also received a workout as a gift. They had the first training together with me, taught me how to use a new gadget. They also explained the basics of anatomy, made a training plan for the month ahead.

With them I prepared for my first half marathon! Thanks!!!

Kelly Jenkins

2 half marathons

I could not start running for a long time, because. Before that, I started several times, but it became difficult and I quit. I heard about RunSmart and running with heart rate control from friends and decided to try it.

I called, the guys asked about my goals and picked up a very interesting option at a discount! Now I run and enjoy running! She has already run 2 half marathons and several shorter races and does not intend to stop!

Thanks!!!
